attributes.action: Scrap Motorbility's Fixed 15,000 miles limitation per year for Motorbility Drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to raise the issue of Motorbility's limited annual milage of 15,000 for their Disabled customers and would like it removed.

The Majority of us disabled customers totally rely on our cars in our daily life to help us maintain independence.The worry of watching the milage clock is such a restriction just so Motorbility can obtain a higher value for the car when the customers 3 yr lease expires IS THIS FAIR!!!!
